pages.text: Greetings, Seeker. If these words reach your mind with clarity, then yours is a rare wisdom â€” one not easily attained. Have the others sensed this truth? It is no small burden to walk a path unseen, to speak and remain unheard. I once tried to warn them... but they turned away. Thus fell our world into silence and ruin. Yet I believe... with the power you now hold, the cycle may still be broken.
